languages.text: "Именем Императора я приговариваю тебя к смерти, Иако Сотний! За предательство всех, кого ты отправил на смерть вместе с сержантом Вигастисом!"
"In the name of the Emperor, I sentence you to death, Iako Sotniy! For the betrayal of every soul you sent to the slaughter with Sergeant Vigastes!"
languages.original_text: "Именем Императора я приговариваю тебя к смерти, Иако Сотний! За предательство всех, кого ты отправил на смерть вместе с сержантом Вигастисом!"

traits.locale_text: "In the name of the Emperor, I sentence you to death, Iako Sotniy! For the betrayal of every soul you sent with Sergeant Vigastes to the slaughter!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "In the name of the Emperor, I sentence you to death, Iako Sotniy! For the betrayal of every soul you sent to the slaughter with Sergeant Vigastes!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “以帝皇的名义，伊科·索蒂尼，我判处你死刑！因为你背叛了维加斯特军士，背叛了每一位与他被一起送入屠宰场的战士！”
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Emperor, I sentence you to death, Iako Sotniy! For the betrayal of every soul you sent to the slaughter with Sergeant Vigastes!"

traits.locale_text: “以帝皇的名义，伊科·索蒂尼，我判处你死刑！因为你背叛了维加斯特军士，背叛了每一位与他被一起送入屠宰场的战士！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「皇帝の名のもと、貴様に死を宣告する、イアコ・ソトニー！ヴィガステス軍曹とともに虐殺するために裏切ったすべての魂のために！」
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Emperor, I sentence you to death, Iako Sotniy! For the betrayal of every soul you sent to the slaughter with Sergeant Vigastes!"

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝の名のもと、貴様に死を宣告する、イアコ・ソトニー！ヴィガステス軍曹とともに虐殺するために裏切ったすべての魂のために！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¡En nombre del Emperador, te condeno a muerte, Iako Sotniy! ¡Por la traición de todas las almas que has enviado al matador con el sargento Vigastes!».
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Emperor, I sentence you to death, Iako Sotniy! For the betrayal of every soul you sent to the slaughter with Sergeant Vigastes!"

traits.locale_text: «¡En nombre del Emperador, te condeno a muerte, Iako Sotniy! ¡Por la traición de todas las almas que has enviado al matador con el sargento Vigastes!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "In the name of the Emperor, I sentence you to death, Iako Sotniy! For the betrayal of every soul you sent to the slaughter with Sergeant Vigastes!"

languages.text: « Au nom de l'Empereur, je vous condamne à mort, Iako Sotniy ! Pour avoir trahi tous ceux que vous avez envoyés vers une mort certaine avec le sergent Vigastes ! »
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Emperor, I sentence you to death, Iako Sotniy! For the betrayal of every soul you sent to the slaughter with Sergeant Vigastes!"

traits.locale_text: « Au nom de l'Empereur, je vous condamne à mort, Iako Sotniy ! Pour avoir trahi tous ceux que vous avez envoyés vers une mort certaine avec le sergent Vigastes ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Im Namen des Imperators verurteile ich Euch zum Tode, Iako Sotniy! Für den Verrat jeder Seele, die Ihr mit Sergeant Vigastes zur Schlachtbank geschickt habt!"
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Emperor, I sentence you to death, Iako Sotniy! For the betrayal of every soul you sent to the slaughter with Sergeant Vigastes!"

traits.locale_text: "Im Namen des Imperators verurteile ich Euch zum Tode, Iako Sotniy! Für den Verrat jeder Seele, die Ihr mit Sergeant Vigastes zur Schlachtbank geschickt habt!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "İhanet ettiğin ve Çavuş Vigastes'le birlikte ölüme yolladığın her bir ruh için İmparator adına seni ölüme mahkûm ediyorum İako Sotniy!"
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Emperor, I sentence you to death, Iako Sotniy! For the betrayal of every soul you sent to the slaughter with Sergeant Vigastes!"

traits.locale_text: "İmparator adına seni ölüme mahkûm ediyorum İako Sotniy! İhanet ettiğin ve Çavuş Vigastes'le birlikte ölüme yolladığın herkes adına!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
